EmissionsActivity.name: EmissionsActivity
EmissionsActivity.description: Represents a companyâ€™s emission generating activities and the greenhouse gas categories that are used to aggregate emissions for these activities.

DataSourceType.description: The source of the emissions activity data. The activity data can be seeded values that can't be changed or deleted or user-defined values.

EmissionsScopeCategory.description: The scope category of the emissions generated by the activity.

IsLocked.description: Indicates if the record is locked or not.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MayEdit.description: Indicates if the record can be edited or not.

Name.description: The name of the emissions activity record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.
